# Installation

Momentum is a minimal, one-task-at-a-time CLI tracker. Follow these steps to install it on your system.

## Requirements
- Python 3.8 or higher
- pip (Python package manager)

## Install from PyPI
To install the latest release from PyPI:

```bash
pip install momentum
```

## Install from Source
If you want the latest development version:

```bash
git clone https://github.com/your-username/momentum.git
cd momentum
pip install .
```

## Verify Installation
After installation, check that Momentum is available:

```bash
momentum --help
```

You should see the CLI help message.
